Substances like mercury, aluminum, formaldehyde, and polysorbate 80 have no place in the human body, especially not in the small, vulnerable bodies of children. The fact is, unvaccinated children are often healthier than their vaccinated peers. They don't suffer from the chronic illnesses and developmental disorders that plague so many vaccinated children today.

Vaccine manufacturers have a long history of covering up adverse reactions and manipulating data to make their products seem safer and more effective than they really are. The truth is, vaccines cause far more harm than good, and the risks far outweigh any potential benefits.

It's time we stop blindly trusting the medical establishment and start questioning the motives behind their aggressive vaccination campaigns. Our children's health and futures depend on it. We must stand up against this assault on their well-being and refuse to subject them to these dangerous and unnecessary injections.
